messages.subject: Re: Interesting Seasonal Ritual-----OH--Kmart---UNDIES--...
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 11/30/1999 6:58:24 AM !!!First Boot!!!, Stuff@ptdprolog.net writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 11/30/1999 6:58:24 AM !!!First Boot!!!,
Stuff@... writes:

<< OH yeah and I wanted to ask......
My kids are sometimes up until 2 AM
AM I alone! >>
You are Definitely not alone here! We do not get up until 10 am, so
bedtime is REAL late. I do enjoy it though. I remember the mornings that the
children were up at 5 and wanted me to cook breakfast. Now they go to bed
around midnight, and dh and I go around 2. It is a sound 8 for me, the kids
get about 9, they gab until they pass out! LOL

Blessings,
Stephanie
Teacher and Mommy of 4 homeschooling fanatics, wife to the best principal,
protector of many pets and wild ones, and unpublished writer.
***Life's Learnings Academy - Protecting Our Children***
IT'S GREAT TO LEARN WHERE THE PRINCIPAL LOVES YOU
ICQ: 43428000 AOL IM: Lifeslearn
